twoSetSkill.name: Periodic Law 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: When Combo/Charged ATKs hit the enemy, deal another 100.0% ATK of Physical DMG. CD: 1s.

threeSetSkill.name: Element Prediction 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: When Basic ATKs hit the enemy, enter Discovery State. Discovery State: Host gains Ignore Interrupt and deals 20.0% more Physical DMG. Discovery State ends and enters a 15s CD when Combo Hit chain is disrupted.
